column4: Hello. I've got weird issue with my Ubuntu. After upgrade, i have used my ubuntu about two weeks. Now sudently, none of the applications wont start. Firefox ect... No errors in logs.
Any idea ? I've checked HW, by dmesg it is allright.
Desktop works fine, no lag or issues, but when i am trying to start some app. IT wont start
run firefox from a terminal, what is output?
